frame.name: Cause_to_end
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> causes a <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> to end.
<ex><fex name="age">Bush</fex> may <t>lift</t> <fex name="sta">sanctions</fex> on his own, despite opposition.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Process
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Process</fen> which is ended by the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action of the <fen>Agent</fen> that causes the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> to end.
</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> is caused to end.
<ex>They <t>ended</t> their relationship <fex name="Place">in the same coffeehouse where it started</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for why the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> is ended.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> is brought to an end.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>Depictive phrase describing the actor of the event that causes the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> to end.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> of causing the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> to end.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual who causes the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> to end.</def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event that causes the <fen>Process</fen> or <fen>State</fen> to end.
<ex><fex name="cau">That move</fex> <t>ended</t> her political career, she said in a 1994 Times Union interview.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: State
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>State</fen> which is ended by the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen>.
<ex>We should <t>end</t> <fex name="sta">poverty</fex>.</ex></def-root>
